title: creative league flaming
body:
anyone got some profanity filter proof favourites? i personally like calling people the following

Help me you "Slotmachine" <-- this is a good one for botlane
Leave me alone you "dirty pigeon" <-- when an enemy camps you
why you gotta be a "Taco taster"? <-- when someone keeps saying mean or rude things to your friend and wont leave them alone

replies.body:
"You're healing the opponents"

-Targeted to any Ezreal on my team

Say things like:
Better luck next time!
Don't worry, we've got the late game.
We can always come back, this isn't pros.

And generally just remind people that Randuin's totally shuts down Yasuo, Zhonya's shuts down Zed, and Executioner's shuts down Soraka. 

Of course, to you this will all be sarcastic and condescending. But to them it appears to be genuine good attitude. Then it's doubley effective.
except the IFS can detect sarcasm if you go overboard with it

sure to an extent it does, but nothing about calling someone a wet tissue... its verbal harassment, sure it might be one of the other categories of bad behaviour if you like spam it or use it aggressively with other words but on its own it doesn't even mean anything but to you haha those teammates you called a fishstick got roasted

now im not saying that you should flame your team mates but we all do it... y not get some enjoyment out of confusing the hell out of them too

> [{quoted}](name=Voldymort,realm=EUNE,application-id=ZGEFLEUQ,discussion-id=NnWlFI2E,comment-id=00000000,timestamp=2018-10-23T06:36:07.441+0000)
>
> except the IFS can detect sarcasm if you go overboard with it

Saying "good job" when someone flashes into a wall or dies three times in a row, sure. But the examples I gave aren't included. Because they would require an extremely exaggerated _delivery_ to even be considered sarcastic. Hence, it's only possible for the person typing it to know. To anyone else, it is completely genuine.

> [{quoted}](name=I Like Teemo,realm=NA,application-id=ZGEFLEUQ,discussion-id=NnWlFI2E,comment-id=,timestamp=2018-10-23T06:26:51.170+0000)
>
> anyone got some profanity filter proof favourites? i personally like calling people the following
> 
> Help me you &quot;Slotmachine&quot; <-- this is a good one for botlane
> Leave me alone you &quot;dirty pigeon&quot; <-- when an enemy camps you
> why you gotta be a &quot;Taco taster&quot;? <-- when someone keeps saying mean or rude things to your friend and wont leave them alone

why am I imagining the Orbitz commercial with "dirty mouth clean it up" where the girl is like who you calling a (something I forgot) you Lint licker.
